mixed-citation.article-title: A new riparian Andean Potamites (Reptilia, Squamata, Gymnophtalmidae) from El Sira Mountains, central Peru, with comments on P. ecpleopus Cope 1875, and on the taxonomy and biogeography of Potamites

tp:treatment-sec.p:
PERU –
Cusco
• Paucartambo, Quebrada San Pedro; CORBIDI 11484, 11485, 16228, 16317, 16318 • Quispicanchi, Capire; CORBIDI 14354, 14356, 14357. –
Madre de Dios
• Tambopata, El Parador; CORBIDI 13547, 13548 • Corredor Manu-Tambopata; CORBIDI 15152 to 15153.
